answers.author: Jesse Himes
answers.text:
Hi Aaron,
That’s a great, unique question. I found a how-to guide on the Knowledge Network that might be useful.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/blogs/blogpost/2259/Best_Practices_in_Writing_RFPs
Let me know if this was helpful!
Jesse Himes, Knowledge Network Intern, jhimes@icma.org

author: Aaron Reeves
text:
We are moving from a "first come, first served" practice to an RFP process for granting Off-Sale Liquor Licenses.  If you use an RFP for granting Liquor Licenses I would like to see some policy and application examples.
Thanks, Aaron
title: Liquor License RFP's
